# The `FixedStackPseudoSourceValue` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A specialized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pseudosourcevalue">PseudoSourceValue</a> for holding FixedStack values, which must include a frame index. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

A specialized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pseudosourcevalue">PseudoSourceValue</a> for holding FixedStack values, which must include a frame index.
